plot outline: Jay is an orphan raised by and is financially supported by his Uncle Satyavan Makarand Anaspure. Satyavan lives in Dubai with his secretary . Satyavan sends Jay a monthly allowance to cover his expenses. Jay has friends called Veeru and Vasanti are buddies who are fun loving people with no worries about the future, they will do anything for money and have a good life. Veeru's father own a scrap business and wanted his son to start taking control of it but Veeru has personal terms. Jay has girlfriend named Isha. Isha is very rich. Along with Veeru and Vasati, Jay and Isha live their lives happily and without worries until the day Jay realizes his Uncle has stopped his allowance. The group creates a plan to make his uncle to support him once again and the confusion it creates forms the crux of story.
title: Sata Lota Pan Sagla Khota
